## Define the decay chain model

```{r decay-model}
decay_chain <- function(time, state, parameters) {
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)), {
    dA <- -lambda1 * A
    dB <- lambda1 * A - lambda2 * B
    dC <- lambda2 * B
    list(c(dA, dB, dC))
    state <- c(A = 100, B = 0, C = 0)
parameters <- c(lambda1 = 0.1, lambda2 = 0.05)
time <- seq(0, 100, by = 1)

  })
}
